comment:
{
    "VARIABLES": "Let x be the number of trips by vans and y be the number of trips by trucks, both integers.",
    "CONSTRAINTS": [
        "x \geq 0",
        "y \geq 0",
        "50x + 80y \geq 1500",
        "30x + 50y \leq 1000",
        "x \geq y",
        "x, y are integers"
    ],
    "OBJECTIVE": "Minimize Z = x + y"
}
